You can help by <a href="/wiki/Special:EditPage/List_of_battles_by_geographic_location" title="Special:EditPage/List of battles by geographic location">adding missing items</a> with <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Reliable sources">reliable sources</a>.</div><p>This <b>list of battles</b> is organized <b> geographically, by country in its present territory</b>.</p><meta property="mw:PageProp/toc" /><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Afghanistan">Afghanistan</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a al-Ulama">Battle of Jouami' al-Ulama</a> – 1700 – <a href="/wiki/Maghrebi_war_(1699%E2%80%931702)" title="Maghrebi war (1699–1702)">Maghrebi war (1699–1702)</a> (<a href="/wiki/Conflicts_between_the_Regency_of_Algiers_and_Morocco" title="Conflicts between the Regency of Algiers and Morocco">Conflicts between the Regency of Algiers and Morocco</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Chelif" title="Battle of Chelif">Battle of Chelif</a> – 1701 – <a href="/wiki/Maghrebi_war_(1699%E2%80%931702)" title="Maghrebi war (1699–1702)">Maghrebi war (1699–1702)</a> (<a href="/wiki/Conflicts_between_the_Regency_of_Algiers_and_Morocco" title="Conflicts between the Regency of Algiers and Morocco">Conflicts between the Regency of Algiers and Morocco</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Bombardment_of_Algiers_(1816)" title="Bombardment of Algiers (1816)">Bombardment of Algiers (1816)</a> – 1816</li></ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Angola">Angola</span><span Angola"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Kombi" title="Battle of Kombi">Battle of Kombi</a> – 1647 – <a 1837–1838</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Beauharnois" title="Battle of Beauharnois">Battle of Beauharnois</a> – 1838 – <a href="/wiki/Lower_Canada_Rebellion" title="Lower Canada Rebellion">Lower Canada Rebellion</a> (<a href="/wiki/Rebellions_of_1837%E2%80%931838" title="Rebellions of 1837–1838">Rebellions of 1837–1838</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Windmill" title="Battle of the Windmill">Battle of the Windmill</a> – 1838 – <a href="/wiki/Patriot_War" title="Patriot War">Patriot War</a> and <a href="/wiki/Upper_Canada_Rebellion" title="Upper Canada Rebellion">Upper Canada Rebellion</a> (<a href="/wiki/Rebellions_of_1837%E2%80%931838" title="Rebellions of 1837–1838">Rebellions of 1837–1838</a>)</li></ul><ul><li>1838 <a href="/wiki/Aroostook_War" followers bomb wellheads in Alberta's oil country</li></ul><dl><dt>21st century</dt></dl><ul><li>2006 – February 28 to present: <a href="/wiki/Caledonia_land_dispute" class="mw-redirect" I</a></li></ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="China">China</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_battles_by_geographic_location&amp;action=edit&amp;section=27" title="Edit section: China"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Mingtiao" title="Battle of Mingtiao">Battle of Mingtiao</a> – c. 1600 BC – <a href="/wiki/Tang_of_Shang" title="Tang of Shang">Tang of Shang's revolution</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Muye" title="Battle of Muye">Battle of Muye</a> – c. 1046 BC – <a href="/wiki/Shang_dynasty" title="Shang dynasty">Fall of the Shang dynasty</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Lize" title="Battle of Lize">Battle of Lize</a> – 478 BC – <a href="/wiki/Warring_States_period" title="Warring States period">Warring States period</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Maling" title="Battle of Maling">Battle of Maling</a> – 342 BC – <a href="/wiki/Warring_States_period" title="Warring States period">Warring States period</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Changping" title="Battle of Changping">Battle of Changping</a> – 262 BC – 260 BC – <a href="/wiki/Warring_States_period" title="Warring States period">Warring States period</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Fei_(233_BCE)" title="Battle of Fei (233 BCE)">Battle of Fei (233 BCE)</a> – 233 BC – <a href="/wiki/Qin%27s_wars_of_unification" title="Qin&#39;s wars of unification">Qin's wars of unification</a> (<a href="/wiki/Warring_States_period" title="Warring States period">Warring States period</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Julu" title="Battle of Julu">Battle of Julu</a> – 207 BC – <a href="/wiki/Chu%E2%80%93Han_Contention" title="Chu–Han Contention">Chu–Han Contention</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Pengcheng" title="Battle of Pengcheng">Battle of Pengcheng</a> – 205 BC – <a href="/wiki/Chu%E2%80%93Han_Contention" title="Chu–Han Contention">Chu–Han Contention</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Jingxing" title="Battle of Jingxing">Battle of Jingxing</a> – 205 BC – <a href="/wiki/Chu%E2%80%93Han_Contention" title="Chu–Han Contention">Chu–Han Contention</a></li><li><a <a href="/wiki/Campaign_against_Dong_Zhuo" title="Campaign against Dong Zhuo">Campaign against Dong Zhuo</a></li></ul><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="End_of_the_Han_dynasty"><a Qing</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Siege_of_L%C3%BCshun" title="Siege of Lüshun">Siege of Lüshun</a> – 1634 – <a href="/wiki/Transition_from_Ming_to_Qing" title="Transition from Ming to Qing">Transition wars</a>) [<a href="/wiki/Ottoman_wars_in_Europe" title="Ottoman wars in Europe">Ottoman wars in Europe</a>]</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Krbava_Field" title="Battle of Krbava Field">Battle of href="/wiki/Battle_of_%C5%BDivoho%C5%A1t%C4%9B" title="Battle of Živohoště">Battle of Živohoště</a> – 1419</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Nekm%C3%AD%C5%99" title="Battle of Nekmíř">Battle of Nekmíř</a> – 1419</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Sudom%C4%9B%C5%99" title="Battle of Sudoměř">Battle of Sudoměř</a> – 1420</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_V%C3%ADtkov_Hill" title="Battle of Vítkov Brüx">Battle of Brüx</a> – 1421</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Kutn%C3%A1_Hora" title="Battle of Kutná Hora">Battle of Kutná Hora</a> – 1421</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Nebovidy" title="Battle of Nebovidy">Battle of Nebovidy</a> – 1422</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_N%C4%9Bmeck%C3%BD_Brod" title="Battle of Německý Brod">Battle of Německý Brod</a> – 1422</li><li><a of Pilsen (1433–1434)</a> – 1433 – 1434</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Lipany" title="Battle of Lipany">Battle of Lipany</a> or <b>Battle of Český Brod</b> – 1434</li><li><a 1438</li></ul><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="17th_century_onwards">17th century onwards</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a defeated British forces.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Tel_al-Kebir" class="mw-redirect" title="Battle of Tel al-Kebir">Battle of Tel al-Kebir</a> – 1882 – Defeat of Urabi by British</li><li><a Alamein">Battle of El Alamein</a> – 1942 – Allied attack on Axis Forces</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Kasserine_Pass" title="Battle of Kasserine Pass">Battle of Kasserine Pass</a> – 1942 – Axis attack on Allied Forces (USA) on Tunisia</li></ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="England">England</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1184024115"><div class="div-col" style="column-width: 20em;"><ul><li><a href="/wiki/First_Battle_of_St_Albans" title="First Battle of St Albans">First Battle of St Albans</a> – 1455</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Blore_Heath" title="Battle of Blore Heath">Battle of href="/wiki/Battle_of_Worksop" title="Battle of Worksop">Battle of Worksop</a> – 1460</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Wakefield" title="Battle of Wakefield">Battle of Wakefield</a> – 1460</li><li><a Albans">Second Battle of St Albans</a> – 1461</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Ferrybridge" title="Battle of Ferrybridge">Battle of Ferrybridge</a> – 1461</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Towton" href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hexham" title="Battle of Hexham">Battle of Hexham</a> – 1464</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Edgcote" title="Battle of Edgcote">Battle of Edgcote</a> or Battle of <b>Banbury</b> or Battle of <b>Danes Moor</b> – 1469</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Losecoat_Field" title="Battle of Losecoat Field">Battle of Losecoat Field</a> or <b>Battle of Empingham</b> – 1470</li><li><a Bosworth Field</a> – 1485</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Stoke_Field" title="Battle of Stoke Field">Battle of Stoke Field</a> – 1487</li></ul></div><h3><span class="mw-headline" class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_battles_by_geographic_location&amp;action=edit&amp;section=61" title="Edit section: Ghana"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Guinea" title="Battle of Guinea">Battle of Guinea</a> – 1478 – <a href="/wiki/War_of_the_Castilian_Succession" title="War of the Castilian Succession">War of the Castilian Succession</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Elmina_(1625)" title="Battle of Elmina (1625)">Battle of Elmina (1625)</a> – 1625 – <a href="/wiki/Dutch%E2%80%93Portuguese_War" title="Dutch–Portuguese War">Dutch–Portuguese War</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Elmina_(1637)" 1802</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Ctesiphon_(1915)" title="Battle of Ctesiphon (1915)">Battle of Ctesiphon (1915)</a> – 1915 – <a href="/wiki/Mesopotamian_campaign" title="Mesopotamian href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_battles_by_geographic_location&amp;action=edit&amp;section=86" title="Edit section: Libya"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Siege_of_Tripoli_(1551)" title="Siege of Tripoli (1551)">Siege of Tripoli (1551)</a> – 1551 – <a href="/wiki/Ottoman%E2%80%93Habsburg_wars" title="Ottoman–Habsburg wars">Ottoman–Habsburg wars</a> (<a href="/wiki/Ottoman_wars_in_Europe" title="Ottoman wars in Europe">Ottoman wars in Europe</a>) and <a href="/wiki/Italian_War_of_1551%E2%80%931559" title="Italian War of 1551–1559">Italian War of 1551–1559</a> (<a href="/wiki/Italian_Wars" title="Italian Wars">Italian Wars</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Action_of_1_August_1801" title="Action of 1 August 1801">Action of 1 August 1801</a> – 1801 – <a href="/wiki/First_Barbary_War" title="First Barbary War">First Barbary War</a> (<a href="/wiki/Barbary_Wars" title="Barbary Wars">Barbary Wars</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/First_Battle_of_Tripoli_Harbor" title="First Battle of Tripoli Harbor">First Battle of Tripoli Harbor</a> – 1802 Iraqis.</li></ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Scotland">Scotland</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a 1745</a> (<a href="/wiki/Jacobite_risings" class="mw-redirect" title="Jacobite risings">Jacobite risings</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Raid_on_Rannoch" title="Raid on Rannoch">Raid on Rannoch</a> – 1753 – Aftermath of <a href="/wiki/Jacobite_rising_of_1745" title="Jacobite rising of 1745">Jacobite rising of 1745</a> (<a href="/wiki/Jacobite_risings" class="mw-redirect" title="Jacobite Munro-Clan Cameron feuds</a></li></ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Senegal">Senegal</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Frigidus" title="Battle of the Frigidus">Battle of the Frigidus</a> – 394 – <a of Carteia (naval)</a> – 206 BC – <a href="/wiki/Second_Punic_War" title="Second Punic War">Second Punic War</a> (<a href="/wiki/Punic_Wars" title="Punic Wars">Punic Wars</a>)</li><li><a class="mw-headline" id="Turkmenistan">Turkmenistan</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_battles_by_geographic_location&amp;action=edit&amp;section=149" title="Edit section: Turkmenistan"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Oxus_River" title="Battle of Oxus River">Battle of Oxus River</a> – 651 – <a href="/wiki/Muslim_conquest_of_Khorasan" title="Muslim conquest of Khorasan">Muslim conquest of Khorasan</a> (<a href="/wiki/Muslim_conquest_of_Persia" title="Muslim conquest of Persia">Muslim conquest of Persia</a>)</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Dandanaqan" title="Battle of Dandanaqan">Battle of Dandanaqan</a> – 1040 – <a href="/w/index.php?title=Seljuk-Ghaznavid_Wars&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Seljuk-Ghaznavid Wars (page does not exist)">Seljuk-Ghaznavid Wars</a></li><li><a invasion of the Khwarazmian Empire</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Siege_of_Merv_(1221)" title="Siege of Merv (1221)">Siege of Merv (1221)</a> – 1221 – <a
